data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of The Company Held On Tuesday February 10 2026 Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of The SEBI LODR
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held on Tuesday February 10 2026 at the registered office of the Company situated at Baid House IInd Floor 1 Tara Nagar Ajmer Road Jaipur-302006 (Rajasthan) which commenced at 01:00 P.M. and concluded at 02:15 P.M. inter alia transacted the following business:

1. Approved the Un-Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended on December 31 2025 pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations. 

2. Took on record the Limited Review Report on the Un-Audited Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended on December 31 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
Please find attached herewith Pre-Issue Advertisement with respect to issue up to 30017075 fully paid up Equity Shares of Face Value of Rs. 2/-each at a price of Rs. 10/- per share for an amount aggregating to 3001.71 Lakhs on the Rights basis in the Ratio of 1 Right Equity Share for every 4 Fully Paid-Up Equity Shares held by the eligible Equity Shareholders as on the Record Date i.e. Monday November 17 2025 in accordance with SEBI ICDR Regulations and other applicable laws("Rights Issue")

In accordance with Regulation 84 of SEBI ICDR Regulations the Company has published a Pre-Advertisement on November 20 2025 in the following Newspapers:

1. Financial Express (National Daily Newspapers) and
2. Business Remedies (Daily Newspaper of the State and Hindi also being the regional language of Rajasthan where our Registered Office is situated)

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: With respect to the captioned subject and our earlier intimation  dated October 01 2025 we are please to inform you that Care Rating Limited (CARE)  has revised the outlook of credit ratings assigned to the Bank facilities of the company from "Outlook: Stable/CARE A3" to "Outlook: Positive/CARE A3" vide their letter dated October 09 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that Care Ratings Limited (CARE) has re-affirmed the credit ratings assigned to the Bank facilities of the Company vide their letter dated September 30 2025.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Please note that pursuant to PIT Regulations and the Companys Code of Conduct for Prohibition of Insider Trading the "trading Window" for trading in shares of the company will be closed from October 01 2025 till the end of 48 hours after the declaration of Un-Audited financial Results for the quarter and half year ended on September 30 2025 for the Directors/Key Managerial Personnel/Designated Persons/Connected Persons of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Dividend Updates
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations we wish to inform you that the members in the 34th AGM held on Friday September 12 2025 through VC/OAVM which commenced at 03:00 P.M. (IST) and 03:41 P.M. (IST) has declared Final Dividend of Rs. 0.10/- ( 5% of Equity Shares of Rs. 2/- each) per equity share as recommended by the Board of Directors for the Financial Year 2024-25.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of Listing Regulation we wish to inform you that the members of the Company in the 34th AGM held on Friday September 12 2025 through VC/OAVM which commenced at 03:00 P.M. (IST) and concluded at 03:41 P.M. (IST) have approved the re-appointment of Mr. Aman Baid as Whole Time Director of the Company for a further period of 3 years with effect from June 01 2026 to May 31 2029

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 we wish to inform you that the Members in the 34th AGM held on Friday September 12 2025 through VC/OAVM which commenced at 03:00 P.M. (IST) and concluded at 03:41 P.M. approved the appointment of M/s. VM & Associates as Secretarial Auditor of the Company for a term of 5 consecutive terms.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Appointment of Statutory Auditor/s
data.news_body: Pusuant to Regulation 30 of Listing Regulations we wish to inform you that members in the 34th AGM held on Friday September 12 2025 through VC/OAVM which commenced at 03:00 P.M. (IST) and concluded at 03:41 P.M. (IST) approved the appointment of M/s ABSM & Associates as Statutory Auditors of the Company for a period of 5 consecutive Years.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizers Report
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 44 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we are enclosing herewith the consolidated Scrutinizers Report on Voting Results of 34th AGM of Members of the Company held on Friday September 12 2025 at 03:00 P.M. (IST) through VC/OAVM

data.caption: Intimation Regarding Postponement Of The Rights Issue Committee Meeting To Be Held On September 15 2025 For Deciding Issue Price And Other Terms Of The Rights Issue.
data.news_body:
In furtherance to our earlier intimation dated September 11 2025 this is to inform you that the meeting of the Rights Issue Committee of the Board of Directors of the Company was scheduled to be held Today at 04:00 P.M. to consider and approve the terms and conditions of the Rights Issue.

As the approval from BSE Limited and National Stock Exchange w.r.t above said Rights Issue is under process. In view of the same the revised date for the meeting of the Rights Issue committee shall be communicated upon receipt of the requisite approvals.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Outcome of AGM
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed summary of the proceedings of the 34th Annual General Meeting of the Company held on Friday September 12 2025 through VC/OAVM which commenced at 03:00 P.M. (IST) and concluded at 03:41 P.M. (IST) (including the time allowed for e-voting at AGM)

data.caption: Prior Intimation Of Meeting Of Members Of The Rights Issue Committee
data.news_body: With reference to the captioned subject matter and with reference to our intimation dated Monday September 08 2025 whereby Board of Directors of the company approved the issuance of fully paid-up equity shares of the company on rights issue basis to the existing eligible equity shareholders of the company  and pursuant to Regulation 29 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that a meeting of members of Rights Issue Committee of the company will be held on Monday September 15 2025 at 04:00 P.M. at the registered office of the company to consider and approve rights entitlement ratio record date etc and letter of offer to be filed with Stock Exchanges and SEBI.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Meeting Of The Members Of Rights Issue Committee Held On Monday September 08 2025 Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (LODR) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body: With reference to the captioned subject matter and with reference to the outcome of meeting of Board of Directors of the Company dated September 08 2025 whereby Board of Directors approved the issuance of fully paid up equity shares of the Company for an amount not exceeding Rs. 35 Crores (including premium) on rights issue basis to the eligible equity shareholders of the Company in accordance of provisions of Companies Act 2013 and the rules made thereunder the SEBI (ICDR) Regulations 2018 and pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations  2015 this is to inform you that the meetings of the members of the Rights Issue Committee of the Company was held today which commenced at 04:00 P.M. and concluded at 04:30 P.M. at the registered office of the Company has considered and approved the Draft Letter of Offer in relation to the Rights Issue of the Company to be filed with BSE Limited and NSE Limited for their in-principle approvals.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations please find enclosed herewith investor presentation to be made to Analyst/Investors on the Un-Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended on June 30 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations please find enclosed herewith investor presentation to be made to Analyst/Investors on the Un-Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended on June 30 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Raising of Funds
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors in their meeting held today at registered office of the Company which commenced at 11:00 A.M. and Concluded at 11:30 A.M. transacted the following Business-

1. Considered and approved offer and issuance of fully paid up equity shares of the company not exceeding Rs. 35 Crores by way of Rights Issue to the existing Shareholders.

2. Approved the Constitution of Rights Issue Committee 

3. Approved the objects of the Rights Issue

data.caption:
Board Meeting Outcome for Considered And Approved The Offer And Issuance Of Fully Paid-Up Equity Shares Of The Company For
An Amount Not Exceeding Rs. 35 Cr. By Way Of Rights Issue
To The Existing Eligible Equity Shareholders Of The Company
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors in their meeting held today at the registered office which commenced at 11:00 A.M. and concluded at 11:30 A.M. inter alia transacted:
1. Considered and approved the Offer and issuance of fully paid-up equity shares  for an amount not exceeding Rs. 35 Cr. by way of rights issue
2. Approved the constitution of a Rights Issue Committee
3. Approved the objects of the Rights Issue

Web-Link To Access The Annual Report For The Financial Year 2024-25

data.news_body: Pursuant to provisions of Regulation 34 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 please find attached herewith Notice of 34th Annual General Meeting of the Members of the Company to be held on Friday September 12 2025 at 03:00 P.M. (IST) through VC/OAVM.

data.news_body:

a) 34th AGM scheduled to be held on Friday September 12 2025 at 03:00 p.m. (IST) through VC/OAVM;

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 47 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed herewith the copy of newspaper advertisement pertaining to Extract of Un-Audited Financial Results of the Company and a Quick Response (QR) code for the Quarter ended on June 30 2025 published in the following newspapers on August 08 2025:

1. Financial Express in English Language (All Edition)
2. Nafa Nuksan in Hindi Language (Daily newspaper of the State)

data.caption:
Statement Of Deviation Or Variation In The Use Of Proceeds Of Allotment Of Warrants On Preferential
Basis For The Quarter Ended On June 30 2025
data.news_body: We hereby confirm that during the quarter ended on June 30 2025 there was no deviation or variation in the utilisation of the proceeds raised through issuance of convertible warrants for the quarter ended on June 30 2025.

data.caption: Intimation Of Record Date For The Purpose Of Final Dividend For The FY 2024-25.
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the company in their meeting held today at the registered office which commenced at 04:00 P.M. and concluded at 04:30 P.M has fixed  September 05 2025 as record date for the purpose of ascertaining the entitlement of members for final dividend for the FY 2024-25.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend
data.news_body: The Board of Directors in their meeting held today at the registered office which commenced at 04:00 P.M.  and concluded at 04:30 P.M. recommended the final dividend of Rs. 0.10/- per equity shares for the FY 2024-25 subject to declaration of the same by members in the ensuing AGM.

data.caption: Intimation Of 34Th Annual General Meeting
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the company in their meeting held today at the registered office which commenced at 04:00 P.M and concluded at 04:30 P.M. approved the holding of 34th AGM of the company on Friday  September 12 2025 at 03: 00 P.M through VC/OAVM.

data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended On June 30 2025.
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at their meeting held today at their registered office which commenced at 04:00 P.M and concluded at 04:30 P.M approved the Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended on June 30 2025 and took on record Limited Review Report thereon.

data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended On June 30 2025.
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at their meeting held today at their registered office which commenced at 04:00 P.M and concluded at 04:30 P.M approved the Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended on June 30 2025 and took on record Limited Review Report thereon.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Appointment of Statutory Auditor/s
data.news_body: The Board of Directors in their meeting held today at the Registered Office of the company which commenced at 04:00 P.M. and concluded at 04:30 P.M have approved the appointment of M/S ABSM & associates as Statutory Auditors of the company for a period of 5 consecutive years from conclusion of 34th AGM till conclusion of 39th AGM.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: The Board of Directors in their meeting held today at the registered office of the company which commenced at 04:00 P.M. and concluded at 04:30 P.M have approved the re-appointment of Mr. Aman Baid as WTD of the company for a further period of 3 years w.e.f June 01 2026 to May 31 2029 subject to approval of members in the ensuing AGM.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Held On Thursday August 07 2025 Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosures Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulat
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the company in their meeting held today at the registered office of the company which commenced at 04:00 P.M and concluded at 04: 30 P.M. transacted the following business:
1. Approved the Un-audited Financial results for the quarter ended on June 30 2025.
2. Approved the re-appointment of Mr. Aman Baid as WTD of the company for a further period of 3 years from June 01 2026 to May 31 2029 subject to approval of members in AGM.
3. Approved the appointment of M/s ABSM & Associates as statutory Auditor of the company
4. Recommended final dividend of Rs. 0.10/- per Equity Shares for the FY- 2024-25 subject to declaration of the same in AGM
5. Approved the holding of 34th AGM on Friday September 12 2025 at 03:00 P.M through VC/OAVM

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board to consider Dividend
data.news_body: To consider and recommend Final Dividend on the Equity Shares of the Company for the FY 24-25 subject to declaration of the same by the shareholders in the ensuing AGM.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Approving The Un-Audited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended On June 2025 And Other Matters.
data.news_body:
Baid Finserv Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 07/08/2025 inter alia to consider and approve 1. The Un-Audited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter ended on June 30 2025 pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations and to take on record the Limited Review Report thereon.
2. Recommendation of Final Dividend on the equity shares of the Company for the FY 24-25 subject to the declaration of the same by the Shareholders in the ensuing AGM.
3. To consider and approve the re-appointment of Mr. Aman Baid (DIN: 03100575) as Whole-Time Director of the Company for a further term of three (3) years commencing from June 01 2026 to May 31 2029 subject to approval of the shareholders in the ensuing Annual General Meeting (AGM).
4. To consider and approve appointment of M/s ABSM & Associates (FRN: 015966C) Chartered Accountants as the Statutory Auditor of the Company for the term of 5 (five) consecutive years commencing from FY 2025-26 to FY 2029-30 subject to approval of members in the ensuing Annual General Meeting.
5. Any other matters related thereto.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
Pursuant to provisions of Section 124(5) and (6) of the Companies Act 2013 read with Rule 6 of IEPF authority (Accounting Audit Transfer and Refund) Rules 2016 as amended from time to time dividend which has not been credited for seven consecutive years or more along with corresponding equity shares shall be transferred to IEPF. Accordingly the final dividend  during the Financial Year 2017-18 which remained unclaimed for a period of seven years will become due to be transferred to IEPF on September 27 2025 along with corresponding shares.

In this regards the company has published a notice in the Financial Express in English Language and Nafa Nuksan in Hindi Language informing the concerned shareholders regarding the ensuing transfer of final dividend and corresponding equity shares to IEPF as per provisions of Companies Act 2013 on June 07 2025

data.news_body:

(Enclosed herewith as Annexure-2).

data.news_body: Disclosure of Related Party Transactions pursuant to Regulation 23 (9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 for the Half Year ended on September 30, 2021

data.caption: Un - Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended On September 30, 2021 Along With The Statement Of Assets And Liabilities As On That Date And Cash Flow Statement For The Half Year Ended On September 30, 2021
data.news_body:
1. Approved the Un - Audited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended on September 30, 2021 along with the statement of assets and liabilities as on that date and cash flow statement for the half year ended on September 30, 2021 pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations.

2. Took on record the Limited Review Report on the Un - Audited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended on September 30, 2021.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Friday, November 12, 2021 Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations').
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held on Friday, November 12, 2021 transacted the following business:

1. Approved the Un - Audited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended on September 30, 2021 along with the statement of assets and liabilities as on that date and cash flow statement for the half year ended on September 30, 2021 pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations.
2. Took on record the Limited Review Report on the Un - Audited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended on September 30, 2021.

data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2021.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we submit herewith the Un-Audited Financial Results for the quarter ended on June 30, 2021, duly approved by the Board of Directors at its meeting held on August 13, 2021.

Further, the extracts of financial results would also be published in the newspapers in compliance with Regulation 47 of the Listing Regulations.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions Pursuant To Regulation 23 (9) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
data.news_body:
Dear Sir / Ma'am,

Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 as amended, please find enclosed herewith Disclosure of Related Party Transactions for the year ended on March 31, 2021.


You are requested to take the same on record.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 and other applicable provisions of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we submit herewith the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended on March 31, 2021, along with the statement of assets and liabilities as on that date and cash flow statement for the year ended on March 31, 2021, duly approved by the Board of Directors at its meeting held on June 22, 2021.

Further Declaration duly signed by Mr. Aditya Baid, Chief Financial officer of the Company that the Auditor''s Report is with unmodified opinion with respect to the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended on March 31, 2021 is also enclosed.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Tuesday June 22, 2021
data.news_body: Outcome of Board Meeting held on Tuesday June 22, 2021 pursuant to Regulation 30 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015
